titleStmt.title: SII 7.778: original edition by K.V. Subrahmanya Aiyer
No. 778. (A.R. No. 153-A of 1902). IN THE SAME PLACE.

revisionDesc.change: Further conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)
Conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)

div.p:
ciṟiman Irācātirācan Irācaparāmecuran kecaveṭṭaikāṟa ciṟipiṟatāpa tevarāyamakārāyaṟku cel
lāṉinṟa cakāttam Āyirattu munṉūṟṟu Ampattu Eḻinmel cellāninṟa naḷacaṅ
kavaccarattu miṉanāyaṟṟu pūṟuvapakkattu viaḻakkiḻamaiyum peṟṟa cattamiyum peṟṟa
veḷḷikiḻamai ṉāḷ tirumāṇikuḻi Utaviāḷuṭaiyaṉayiṉāṟku kuṭutta yolai Ilakkaṇateṇ
ṇāyakkaUṭaiyār IĀḻppāyai napaṭamaṉam Iḻam Aḻikkai kāriyamāka campāṉileṉa yamaitta kutiraimaṉi
ttar cayikkumāka Eṟukaiyil Itukku camuttirayāttiraitāṉamākak kuṭutta Āṇa
ttil Etirilicoḻaṉ tirunāmattukkāṇiāka kuṭutta nilam niṅkalāka tiṟappāy nammuṭai
ya civitamāy patintuvarukiṟa nilam Uḷḷatu Inta nāyiṉāĀṟkut taraveṇumeṉṟu tirumāṇi
kuḻi tirumāḷikaikkūṟu Ilakkaṇataṇṇāyakka vāṇātarāyar coṉṉapaṭiĀle nammu
ṭaiya perāle Oru cantiyum Amutuceyyappaṇṇi Antac cantiyil Amutuceyta coṟu Ila
kkaṇataṇṇāyakka vāṇātarāyar peṟumpaṭi kaṟpittu Ūrcernta taṭiUṭpaṭa nāṉku E
llaiyum tevatāṉamāka naṭakkumpaṭi kaṟpittuviṭṭa Aḷavukku cantiṟaĀtittavarai
yum tevatāṉamāka Aṉupavittukkoṇṭupotavum Ivai toṇṭaimāṉ E
ḻuttu .
Digital edition of SII 7.778 by converted to DHARMA conventions by Dorotea Operato.
